fields.name: Everyone
fields.description: Content is generally suitable for all ages. May contain minimal cartoon, fantasy or mild violence and/or infrequent use of mild language.

fields.name: Everyone 10+
fields.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 10 and up. May contain more cartoon, fantasy or mild violence, mild language and/or minimal suggestive themes.

fields.name: Teen
fields.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up. May contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, minimal blood, simulated gambling and/or infrequent use of strong language.

fields.name: Mature
fields.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. May contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language.

fields.name: Adults Only
fields.description: Content suitable only for adults ages 18 and up. May include prolonged scenes of intense violence, graphic sexual content and/or gambling with real currency.

fields.name: Rating Pending
fields.description: Not yet assigned a final ESRB rating. Appears only in advertising, marketing and promotional materials related to a physical (e.g., boxed) video game that is expected to carry an ESRB rating, and should be replaced by a game's rating once it has been assigned.
